dt: {bc}a somewhat spicy sauce that consists typically of ketchup or tomato-based {d_link|chili sauce|chili sauce} mixed with horseradish and often lemon juice, {d_link|Worcestershire sauce|Worcestershire sauce}, and hot-pepper sauce and that is served especially as a condiment for cold seafood (such as shrimp or oysters)
